fr.playsoft.android.tools.resource

Class DownloadThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.playsoft.android.tools.resource.DownloadThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class DownloadThread
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Single data downloading thread.
    Author:
    Olgierd Uzieblo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_IMAGE_SIZE
      Max physical size of file for small files engine - if image is larger download will be terminated!
      static int MAX_RETRIES
      Max retries before task will be failed
      static String TAG
      Tag for this class
      static int THREAD_TYPE_LARGE_FILES
      Thread used for downloading of large files
      static int THREAD_TYPE_SMALL_FILES
      Thread used for downloading of small files

      Creates the downloading thread.
